Vouch Mobile vs Metro by T-Mobile

See how Vouch Mobile compares to Metro by T-Mobile on price, coverage, and features

Quick Comparison

Feature Vouch Mobile Metro by T-Mobile

Metro by T-Mobile Pros

  • Wide retail presence
  • Phone deals with activation
  • T-Mobile 5G coverage in cities

Metro by T-Mobile Cons

  • T-Mobile has weaker rural coverage
  • Data deprioritization on all plans
  • Unlimited plans cost more

Why Choose Vouch Mobile Over Metro by T-Mobile?

  • Better AT&T rural coverage
  • Lower price for unlimited data
  • Month-to-month without store visits
  • No deprioritization hassles

The Verdict

While Metro by T-Mobile has its strengths, Vouch Mobile offers a compelling alternative with straightforward $30/month pricing on AT&T's reliable network. With no credit check required, no contracts, and 5G included at no extra cost, Vouch Mobile is the smarter choice for budget-conscious consumers who don't want to sacrifice network quality.

Ready to Switch from Metro by T-Mobile?
